headline: Local Hero SuperBrayden Defeats $0
context: The city rejoiced today as SuperBrayden finally achieved victory over his archnemesis. Clad in his red costume, SuperBrayden used his powers of $1 to save the day, and our fair city.
His trusty sidekick Alvin able to stop the dastardly villain by $2. Alvin's diet of $3-enriched dog food has given him superpowers as well, which proved invaluable today.
"We owe SuperBrayden a debt of gratitude," said Mayor McCrudden. "Without him, we'd all be $4 right now. We owe him all our lives."
Footage of the epic battle can be found on $5.

phrases.text: Dana Weimeraner, lead researcher at the Institute for Food Science
The Pallbearer, professional wrestler and accordion collector
Jeffrey Daniels, recipient of the 2017 Janitor of the Year Award
